candidates.name: Cory Burling
candidates.why_elect: Being born and bred in Masterton, I'm lucky to be known as a 'local'. Being a Tradie with 17 years experience can only benefit all council consultations, and I have a wealth of experience in the hardships of week to week living. Honesty and integrity go a long way.
candidates.why_stand: I'm lucky to call Masterton home, but it's time to change council direction, so that my children and future generations can be happy to call Masterton home. As an active member of our community, and as a leader, I'm passionate about putting my name forward to improve our community.

candidates.name: Graeme Farr
candidates.why_elect: Anyone else is probably better than me but I am better than no-one. And no-one seems to have put their hand up! And I won't give up until I drive through it!
candidates.why_stand: I am running for all three Wairarapa mayoralties to get people focused on building a tunnel through the Rimutakas. Anywhere else in the world would have done this 50 or more years ago. The route is much simpler than you think and the benefits for the region are enormous.

candidates.name: Tina Nixon
candidates.why_elect: I have a strong community and economic development background and governance experience. I have worked for the Canterbury Earthquake Recovery Authority in a senior position so understand the benefits of spatial planning,urban development and meaningful stakeholder engagement.
candidates.why_stand: I'm running for Mayor and council as we need a civic leader who won't muck about, who gets things done and refocuses council on core business. It's time to get rates increases under control and work with central govt to develop better funding models for key infrastructure.

candidates.name: Lyn Patterson
candidates.why_elect: I have a finance background as a Chartered Accountant so can ensure that ratepayers receive best value for their rate dollars. Being an accessible Mayor is important to me. I like getting out and about in the community to meet you and listen to your ideas and issues.
candidates.why_stand: I love the region in which I live. Masterton is thriving with many projects on the go and an increasing diverse population. I am a strong and positive leader and want to continue to deliver the best services to all our people.
